item.title: VFC
item.description: score:190 Chances: VF Corp. operates through multiple segments, including Outdoor, Active, Work, and Other, which demonstrates a diversified business model. The company’s focus on authentic outdoor-based lifestyle brands and activity-based lifestyle brands shows potential for growth and market relevance. The recent cyberattack on VF Corp.
